A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can definitely understand why a lot of fans seem to be having a mixed reaction to this film. I would bet that the reason for that mixed reaction is the very reason I really enjoyed it. This is the best made Star Wars movie there is. Don’t get me wrong I still love the original trilogy and rate the first two higher. Just because it’s different doesn’t mean it’s bad. If it weren’t for the\, admittedly very bad\, section with a casino town this would be at least 4 and half; maybe even 5 stars. I also think Johnson created one of the most technically beautiful and stunning images\, not just in Star Wars; but of all time... you will know it when you see it!
